Name: Minebot expedition
About the game: Minebot Expedition - you, as a robot, go on an adventure across the remains of civilization, collecting the most valuable thing left of it - emeralds. A man-made disaster has turned simple harmless bees into killer bees so powerful that only automatic systems and a handful of surviving robots from TechnoRot, an automated robot company, have survived. collect all the emeralds, deliver them to the warehouse of the technorot bypassing the killer bees. Be careful, some bees are especially dangerous! you have only one life to collect all the emeralds and deliver them to the warehouse. Peculiarities: Graphics by DODO GamerY soundtrack by Uikilinsa an unforgettable post-apocalyptic adventure bosses
